detectors.description:
Lotto.selectWinner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#33-42) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#38)
detectors.markdown:
[Lotto.selectWinner()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L33-L42) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [owner.transfer(this.balance)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L38)

detectors.description: Lotto.refund() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#54-60) has external calls inside a loop: playerPool[i].transfer(100000000000000000) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#57)

detectors.description: Parameter Lotto.changeOwner(address)._newOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#25) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Lotto.setWinner(address)._PlayerWinner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#45) is not in mixedCase
Variable Lotto.PlayerWinner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#7) is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in Lotto.selectWinner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#33-42):
	External calls:
	- playerPool[winner].transfer(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#37)
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#38)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- setWinner(PlayerWinner) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#39)
		- PlayerWinner = _PlayerWinner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#46)
	- playerPool.length = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#40)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Lotto.selectWinner()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L33-L42):
	External calls:
	- [playerPool[winner].transfer(amount)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L37)
	- [owner.transfer(this.balance)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L38)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [setWinner(PlayerWinner)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L39)
		- [PlayerWinner = _PlayerWinner](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L46)
	- [playerPool.length = 0](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Lotto.sol#L40)
